title: How to Clean Mother of Pearl (Nacre)

steps.title: Make sure the cleaning cloth is nice and soft.
steps.content: Make sure the cleaning cloth is nice and soft.

steps.title: Be super gentle as you clean off the surface.
steps.content: Be super gentle as you clean off the surface.

steps.title: A silk cloth is a great option for polishing.
steps.content: A silk cloth is a great option for polishing.

steps.title: Put it back in storage once it's completely dry.
steps.content: Put it back in storage once it's completely dry. If it is on display, be sure that its base is dry.
